about_the_game:
Wouldn't you like to play with dangerous prisoners, make them suffer defeat and humiliation, and have your heart broken by their darkness?
"Romp of Dump" is the perfect game for women who want to enjoy such immorality.


Players, as death row inmates falsely accused of being serial killers, attempt to communicate with abnormal criminal prisoners through "betting cards".

A "penalty game" for losers!　Beat the dangerous prisoners, dent their pride, and collect the episodes told in the Penalty Game to unravel the bizarre crimes they committed.

This is a bromance visual novel that offers the immoral experience of a public execution.
The saved data from the demo version can be carried over to the full version.


It includes four casino-style mini-games, including "Blackjack," and a visual novel tailored to short stories.

The ability to recognize small gestures and changes in facial expressions and dialogue of unique characters determines the winner, allowing players to enjoy playing games against the CPU.

Streamers can get excited by predicting the score with their viewers!


Live2D animated standing drawings with a high range of motion animate a variety of facial expressions and gestures to color the conversational drama.
The total number of motions for all characters is more than 200, and each character has more than 100 different facial expressions!

The scenario is a massive volume of over 200,000 words in all.
It can be played casually or in depth by collecting numerous branches and delving deeply into the world.

The main scenario is a suspense story about a bizarre crime.
Gathering information and hypotheses about the case and unraveling the truth with your own hands, the development is sure to be exciting as you anticipate the true story!

【Live Game Streaming and Fan Art Guidelines】

"Romp of Dump" welcomes game distribution and fan art!
I welcome both individuals and corporations to distribute and monetize their work without permission.
There are no restrictions on spoilers, and you can distribute up to the end of the story.
When submitting videos, please include the name of the game and a link to the official website or Steam store page.
When submitting fan art, we would appreciate it if you could clearly state the name of the work and use the hashtag #RompOfDump

【Story】


1992, Dumpir, a city of pleasure and immorality.
When this place, threatened by the shadow of a serial killer, was still called paradise....
The Dumpir Prison, called the "Dump," is a cesspool where those who misbehave in the city at night are thrown in.
There was a bored death row prisoner there…


Hi, I'm "As K. Nightmare". You can call me "K-Nnight" if you like.
I'm not comfortable with the idea of sitting back and waiting to be executed for a crime I didn't commit, so I'm thinking of playing cards with all the prisoners.
The loser gets a penalty game...well, let me tell you a funny story.
Like what crime they came to this prison for...?

The key to winning is to recognize the quirks of characters animated in Live2D.
Play with the scum prisoners in a new type of card game.

【CHARACTER】



As K. Nightmare
Well, I'm a guy who has XXX with everyone... but I don't remember having XXX with any goddess of the law, okay?
Charges: Serial murder and XXXX
Sentence: Death penalty
The protagonist of this story.
He was falsely convicted and sentenced to death.
He is a man with a dangerous charm that captivates people.


Louq＝Goodman
Oh, uh, you know. I'm Lou, Lou... Louq. Ah! "Louq", not "Looouq"...!

Charges: murder, abandonment of a corpse
Sentence: 2 years and 6 months
An exemplary person to be bullied. He seems harmless by all accounts.
He is a "37 year old kid" who acts healthy despite his difficulties in life.


Faye
My name is Master Faye!　I'm the worst, worst, worst hitman of ACIDD, the Tamayuran Mafia, remember that!

Charges: murder, aggravated assault
Sentence: 70 years
Despite his neutral appearance, he is a troublemaker with a constant stream of extreme words and actions.
His empty head is filled with murderous intent and cruelty.


Durum De Milo
We are what the guards call us by number.We are each other's cesspool trash and need no further relationship.

Charges: bodily injury, confinement
Sentence: 22 years
A taciturn loner who hates to get along with others.
He appears to be a sensible man, but his words and actions reveal a deep darkness.


Franbel Ripstein
I followed my beliefs and did the right thing. That's the decisive difference between me and you scum...

Charges: Damage to dead body
Sentence: 3 years of imprisonment
He is calm, proud and fastidious.
He was an excellent doctor before his arrest and despises other prisoners as "Lowlife".


Drake O Mojita
Well, you can lick it all you want. Someday I'll make you understand that it's a terrible poison...

Charges: Drug trafficking, murder
Sentence: 25 years in prison
He is a drug dealer known as "Little Draco".
He is a charlatan who loves money, but is also rumored to be ruthless and sharp.

【CREDIT】

・Promotional movie narration：音読さん

highlighted.name: Welcome to the Dumpir Prison full of lunatics.
One on one match between the prisoners!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains bizarre crimes, drugs, prostitution and its facilitation, bullying, child abuse, sexual expressions, various sexual orientations and perversions including homosexuality, and disregard for the feelings of the bereaved family, and Inappropriate remarks.
These expressions do not include direct depictions and are not intended to affirm or promote discrimination, prejudice, or crime.
If you are under 15 years of age or if you are offended or traumatized by any of the above elements, please do not play this game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11, 12, 13, 14
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel® Core ™ i5 or more
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 460
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11, 12, 13, 14
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel® Core ™ i7 or more
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Romp of Dump

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10,11
  • Processor: Intel® Core ™ i5 or more
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core ™ i7 or more
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Visual novel fully animated in Live2D, Observing Scum Prisoners! In a prison called a dump, a betting card game among dangerous prisoners begins. Penalty game for the losers! Uncover the hidden pasts and bizarre crimes of these lunatics!
